text: The Church Street bombing was a car bombing on 20 May 1983 by Umkhonto we Sizwe, in Pretoria, South Africa.1983; Car bomb in South Africa kills 16 It killed the two bombers (because it exploded ten minutes earlier than they intended) and 17 other people. == References == Category:1983 Category:1980s building bombings Category:20th century in South Africa Category:Building bombings in Africa Category:Car and truck bombings in Africa Category:Car and truck bombings in the 1980s Category:Mass murder in Africa Category:Mass murder in the 1980s Category:Pretoria Category:Terrorist incidents in Africa Category:Terrorist incidents in the 1980s
title: Church Street, Pretoria bombing
